ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Leveling when new
ygData.msgSnippet: If you re a twinked newbie, buy deathfist belts and turn them in in West Freeport and you can go from 1 to about 14 with enough belts in just a few minutes
ygData.messageBody:
If you're a twinked newbie, buy deathfist belts and turn them in in West Freeport and you can go from 1 to about 14 with enough belts in just a few minutes LOL.  But your skills will suck so this isn't always a good thing to do. 

If you're in the EC area, go to an Orc camp and hunt, I always level nicely there. 

Lena

Trying to keep discussions alive........
What is a good way to level up fast.   Meaning, I see
people say things like I can get from level 3-6 in
around an hour.

Well, the other day, I was on 5 hours and just leveled
once.

As a Newbie should we venture to more hostile grounds
with others to level?  Should we go to the same types
of places as a group but not form a group so I can
level faster?  Or just stay in the newbie area until
we get there?

Enough for now

Later all helpfuls.....
